name: Sonic Tameshi
summary:
Sonic Tameshi is a Classic Sonic Fan Game created on the Sonic Worlds engine.

The game's story follows Sonic after he finds out about Dr Eggman's new plan to extract all the natural resources from an Mystical island. Face Metal Sonic and save the island, stop Eggman from building the Pleasure Island Theme Park and save the beautiful paradise hidden on the other side of the sea. Sonic will feature the Drop Dash, Insta-Shield, Peel Out and a Wall jump!
